title: Print, "The Feather of a Big Bird (Otorige), No. 27", ca. 1910
markings: In graphite, lower left: The Feather of a Big Bird
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower left: [Japanese characters] / no. 27 / Otorige.
description: A large iris, outer perianth leaves purple; inner leaves magenta and purple.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "The Feather of a Big Bird (Otorige), No. 27", ca. 1910.
ca. 1910. 40.8 x 27.9 cm (16 1/16 in. x 11 in.). Gift of Mary Rutherford Jay. 1948-134-80.
